alert.note: Alert for Kenosha; Racine (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued October 12 at 12:38PM CDT until October 12 at 1:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 100 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN RACINE AND KENOSHA COUNTIES... At 1237 PM CDT, tornado producing storms were located along a line extending from near Oak Creek to near Yorkville to Spring Grove, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Damaging tornado. SOURCE...Radar confirmed tornado just west of Franksville. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Kenosha, Racine, Mount Pleasant, Pleasant Prairie, Sturtevant, Union Grove, Paddock Lake, Camp Lake, Twin Lakes, Raymond, Yorkville, Silver Lake, Wind Point, Eagle Lake, Caledonia, Salem, Bristol, Paris, Brighton and Somers. TORNADO...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN
info.instruction: To repeat, a tornado is on the ground. TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
